home.paragraph1: I am YoungLeï¼Œa front-end development engineer who loves programming and games as an afterthought
home.paragraph2: I also write about <github-link>open source</github-link> projects, and in addition I like to <blog-link>blog</blog-link> about my development work and daily life.
home.paragraph3: I've tried using several blogging applications, but not much valuable content has been written down. This time I'm going to implement my own blog using Next.js and plan to spend some time sinking my teeth into it and writing about it.
home.software-li1: This website is built with <Next.js-link>Next.js</Next.js-link>, and <tailwindcss-link>Tailwindcss</tailwindcss-link>. I use <vercel-link>Vercel</vercel-link> for hosting
home.software-li2: This blog post is written in <mdx-link>MDX</mdx-link> and parsed using <contentLayer-link>ContentLayer</contentLayer-link>.
home.chatgpt: Use as the official ChatGPT, with even more powerful features.
